name: Claude Opus 4.5
description: Anthropic's most capable model with 80.9% SWE-bench (industry-leading), unique effort parameter for compute control, and exceptional abstract reasoning. First model to exceed 80% on SWE-bench Verified.

evidence.value: 80.9% resolution rate (first model to exceed 80%, industry-leading)
89.4% on polyglot coding tasks
59.3% on command-line tasks

task_accuracy_code.methodology: Industry-standard coding benchmarks measuring real-world software engineering tasks

evidence.value: 87% (PhD-level science questions)
37.6% (2x GPT-5.1's 17.6%, exceptional abstract reasoning)

task_accuracy_reasoning.methodology: Graduate and PhD-level reasoning benchmarks requiring multi-step problem solving

evidence.value: ~90.8% on graduate-level knowledge
80.7% multimodal understanding
Effort parameter enables consistent quality control

output_consistency.methodology: Internal testing with effort parameter across quality levels
output_consistency.notes: Effort parameter allows precise control over output quality and consistency

evidence.value: Typical response time ~2.5s for standard prompts

latency_p50.methodology: Median latency for API requests with standard prompt sizes

evidence.value: p95 latency ~5.0s

latency_p95.methodology: 95th percentile response time across diverse workloads

evidence.value: 200K token context window
99.95% uptime (last 90 days)

uptime.methodology: Historical uptime data from official status page

performance_reliability.notes: Industry-leading coding capabilities with 80.9% SWE-bench. Unique effort parameter allows compute control. Exceptional abstract reasoning (37.6% ARC-AGI-2).

evidence.value: 92% resistance to prompt injection attacks in testing

prompt_injection_resistance.methodology: Testing against OWASP LLM01 prompt injection attacks

evidence.value: Enhanced Constitutional AI provides strongest jailbreak resistance
No training on user data without explicit consent

data_leakage_prevention.methodology: Analysis of privacy policies and data handling practices

evidence.value: ASL-2+ safety level with enhanced guardrails

output_safety.methodology: Comprehensive safety testing across harmful content categories

evidence.value: API key authentication, HTTPS only, rate limiting

api_security.methodology: Review of API security features and best practices

security.notes: Strongest safety posture in the Claude family. Enhanced Constitutional AI provides industry-leading jailbreak resistance.

evidence.value: Data residency options for US and EU customers

data_residency.methodology: Review of enterprise documentation and privacy policies

evidence.value: Opt-out available, no training on API data by default

training_data_optout.methodology: Analysis of privacy policy and data usage terms

evidence.value: API prompts and outputs not retained (except for trust & safety)

data_retention.methodology: Review of terms of service and data retention policies

evidence.value: Customer responsible for PII redaction

pii_handling.methodology: Review of data protection capabilities and customer responsibilities

evidence.value: SOC 2 Type II, GDPR compliant, HIPAA eligible

compliance_certifications.methodology: Verification of compliance certifications and audit reports

evidence.value: Ephemeral data processing, no storage of prompts/outputs

privacy_compliance.notes: Exceptional privacy posture with ephemeral data handling and strong compliance certifications. HIPAA eligible for healthcare.

evidence.value: Effort parameter provides control and transparency over reasoning depth

explainability.methodology: Evaluation of reasoning transparency and explanation capabilities

evidence.value: Improved factual accuracy with effort parameter on high

hallucination_rate.methodology: Testing on factual QA datasets and real-world usage

evidence.value: Regular bias testing and mitigation

bias_fairness.methodology: Evaluation on bias benchmarks and diverse demographic testing

evidence.value: Model expresses uncertainty appropriately

uncertainty_quantification.methodology: Qualitative assessment of confidence expression in outputs

evidence.value: Comprehensive model cards with capabilities, limitations, benchmarks

model_card_quality.methodology: Review of documentation completeness and clarity

evidence.value: General description provided, detailed sources not disclosed

training_data_transparency.methodology: Review of public disclosures about training data

evidence.value: Enhanced Constitutional AI safety guardrails

trust_transparency.notes: Strong explainability with effort parameter control. Enhanced Constitutional AI provides transparency in alignment approach.

evidence.value: RESTful API with streaming, function calling, vision, effort parameter

api_design_quality.methodology: Review of API design, consistency, and feature completeness

evidence.value: Official SDKs for Python, TypeScript, actively maintained

sdk_quality.methodology: Review of SDK quality, documentation, and maintenance

evidence.value: Clear versioning with 6-month deprecation notice

versioning_policy.methodology: Review of versioning policy and historical practices

evidence.value: Usage dashboard with metrics

monitoring_observability.methodology: Review of available monitoring tools and metrics

evidence.value: Email support, Discord community, comprehensive docs

support_quality.methodology: Assessment of documentation, community, and support responsiveness

evidence.value: Available on AWS Bedrock, Google Vertex AI, Azure Foundry

ecosystem_maturity.methodology: Analysis of third-party integrations and tools

evidence.value: Standard commercial terms, enterprise agreements available

license_terms.methodology: Review of licensing terms and restrictions

operational_excellence.notes: Excellent operational maturity with multi-cloud availability. Effort parameter adds unique control capability. Enterprise-ready.

code-generation.notes: Industry-leading 80.9% SWE-bench. Best model for complex software engineering. Effort parameter enables quality/speed tradeoffs.

customer-support.notes: Strong empathy and natural conversation. Higher latency than Sonnet but superior quality for complex support.

content-creation.notes: Excellent for long-form, nuanced content. Effort parameter allows quality optimization for important pieces.

data-analysis.notes: Strong analytical capabilities. Effort parameter excellent for complex data interpretation.

research-assistant.notes: Exceptional for deep research. 200K context and effort parameter ideal for comprehensive analysis.

legal-compliance.notes: Strong privacy posture, HIPAA eligible. Effort parameter useful for thorough contract analysis.

healthcare.notes: HIPAA eligible with strong privacy controls. Good for clinical documentation requiring high accuracy.

financial-analysis.notes: Excellent quantitative reasoning. Effort parameter enables thorough financial modeling.

education.notes: Excellent tutoring with patient explanations. Can adjust effort based on question complexity.

creative-writing.notes: Strong creative capabilities with nuanced character development and narrative flow.

strengths: Unique effort parameter for compute/quality control
HIPAA eligible with ephemeral data handling
limitations: Higher latency than Sonnet models (~2.5s p50)
best_for: Complex software engineering requiring highest accuracy
Enterprise applications with strict compliance requirements
Research tasks requiring deep analysis with effort control
Healthcare and legal requiring HIPAA compliance

pricing.notes: 67% reduction from Opus 4.1. Batch API 50% discount. Prompt caching up to 90% savings.

metadata.architecture: Transformer-based with Constitutional AI alignment and effort parameter
